NK040(thi)041:1: // mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bskang ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)041:3: 'og min gnas dang o rgyan gnas //
NK040(thi)041:4: mkha' spyod gnas dang bde chen gnas //
NK040(thi)041:5: dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams nas //
NK040(thi)041:7: sprul pa yang sprul pho nyar bcas //
NK040(thi)041:8: 'bum tsho lnga yi tshogs bcas rnams //
NK040(thi)041:10: tshogs mchod 'bul phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)041:11: thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)041:12: nyams chag bskang phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)041:13: byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)041:14: dngos grub ster phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)041:15: gshegs nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK040(thi)041:17: shar rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)041:18: sku mdog sngon mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)041:19: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bsgrad //
NK040(thi)041:20: phyag g.yas pas gri gug nam mkhar phyar //
NK040(thi)041:21: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha thugs kar bsnams //
NK040(thi)041:22: zhal gdangs mche gtsig dbu skra mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:23: rus pa'i brgyan drug sku la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:24: thod skam lnga yi dbu la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:25: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)041:26: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum ro'i gdan //
NK040(thi)041:27: kha t+w+aam ka ni gru mor thog /
NK040(thi)041:28: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)041:29: sngon mo 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)041:30: 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)041:32: dbus sangs rgyas rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)041:33: sku mdog dkar mo gzi dmangs can //
NK040(thi)041:34: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bsgrad //
NK040(thi)041:35: g.yas pas gri gug nam mkhar phyar //
NK040(thi)041:36: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha thugs kar bsnams //
NK040(thi)041:37: zhal gdang mche gtsig dbu skra mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:38: rus pa'i rgyan drug sku la mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:39: thod skam lnga yi dbu la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:40: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)041:41: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum ro yi gdan //
NK040(thi)041:42: kha t+w+aam ka ni gru mor thog /
NK040(thi)041:43: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i thugs dkar mo 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)041:44: lho rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)041:45: sku mdog ser mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)041:46: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bsgrad //
NK040(thi)041:47: g.yas pas gri gug nam mkhar phyar //
NK040(thi)041:48: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha thugs kar bsnams //
NK040(thi)041:49: zhal gdongs mche gtsig dbu skra mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:50: rus pa'i brgyan drug sku la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:51: thod skam lnga yi dbu la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:52: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)041:53: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum ro yi gdan //
NK040(thi)041:54: kha t+w+aam ka ni gru mor thog /
NK040(thi)041:55: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i ser mo 'bum gyis 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)041:56: nub pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)041:57: sku mdog dmar mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)041:58: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bsgrad //
NK040(thi)041:59: g.yas pas gri gug nam mkha' phyar //
NK040(thi)041:60: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha thugs kar bsnams //
NK040(thi)041:61: zhal gdongs mche gtsig dbu skra mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:62: rus pa'i brgyan drug sku la brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:63: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)041:64: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum ro'i gdan //
NK040(thi)041:65: kha t+w+aam ka ni gru mor thogs //
NK040(thi)041:66: pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i dmar mo 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)041:67: byang las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)041:68: sku mdog ljang ku gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)041:69: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bsgrad //
NK040(thi)041:70: g.yas pas gri gug nam mkhar phyar //
NK040(thi)041:71: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha thugs kar bsnams //
NK040(thi)041:72: zhal mdangs mche gtsig dbu skra mdzes //
NK040(thi)041:73: rus pa'i brgyan drug sku la gsol //
NK040(thi)041:74: thod skam lnga'i dbu brgyan can //
NK040(thi)041:75: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)041:76: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum ro yi gdan //
NK040(thi)041:77: kha t+w+aam ka ni gru mor thogs //
NK040(thi)041:78: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i ljang mo 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)041:80: phyi yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK040(thi)041:81: chu gtsang yid du 'ong ba'i phyir //
NK040(thi)041:83: mchod yon ci snyed yod pa rnams //
NK040(thi)041:84: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)041:86: a ga ru dang sbrul snying dang //
NK040(thi)041:87: du ru ka dang gor shi ka /
NK040(thi)041:88: spos dkar dza ti la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:89: bdug spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
NK040(thi)041:90: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i thugs 'khor 'bum tsho lnga'i nyi ma me shel la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:91: zla ba chu shel las grub pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:93: mar gyi me chen la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:94: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho lnga yi ga pur dang ni gur gum dang //
NK040(thi)041:95: tsan+dana dkar dmar la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:96: dri mchog rnam pa sna tshogs gi //
NK040(thi)041:97: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i thugs 'khor 'bum tsho lnga'i ka ra bu ra ma sbrang rtsi dang //
NK040(thi)041:98: 'o zho mar thud rgya ja dang //
NK040(thi)041:99: shing thog sil thog sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)041:100: nas dang gro sogs 'bru yi rigs //
NK040(thi)041:101: 'bras dang bshos gtsang la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:102: zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs gi //
NK040(thi)041:103: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)041:104: 'khor 'bum tsho lnga'i rnga chen dung dang pi wang dang //
NK040(thi)041:105: mkhar rnga sil snyan ting ting shag /
NK040(thi)041:106: cha lang dril bu la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:107: sgra snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
NK040(thi)041:108: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum mtsho lnga'i gdug dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
NK040(thi)041:109: rnga yab dang ni dar chen dang //
NK040(thi)041:110: lda ldi phye ma phur ma dang //
NK040(thi)041:111: 'phan dang bla bre la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:112: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gi //
NK040(thi)041:113: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho lnga'i h'u /
NK040(thi)041:115: nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK040(thi)041:116: sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga //
NK040(thi)041:117: ye shes lnga'i byin rlabs kyi //
NK040(thi)041:118: zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsi 'di //
NK040(thi)041:119: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho lnga'i bza' ba sha yi ri bo dang //
NK040(thi)041:120: btung ba khrag gi rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)041:121: zhe sdang rus pa'i gram khrod kyi //
NK040(thi)041:122: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho 'bru bcud nas kyi chang mchod dang //
NK040(thi)041:123: bdud rtsi ril bu sbyar ba 'di //
NK040(thi)041:124: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho rkang chen dung gi gling bu dang //
NK040(thi)041:125: thod pa ltag sprod rnga sgra yi //
NK040(thi)041:126: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho bdun sha chen spos kyi dud pa dang //
NK040(thi)041:127: tshil chen mar me mdangs gsal gyi //
NK040(thi)041:128: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho 'bras kyi gtor ma chen po la //
NK040(thi)041:129: sha sna khrag sna mang pos brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:130: skye 'gro sems can sna tshogs bcug /
NK040(thi)041:131: 'bru sna kun gyi chang gis bran //
NK040(thi)041:132: mkha' 'gro sde'i 'khor 'bum tsho klad pa ko ro tsa na dang //
NK040(thi)041:133: tsit+ta snying sna thams cad kyi //
NK040(thi)041:136: gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni //
NK040(thi)041:137: thabs kyi rang bzhin yab chen dang //
NK040(thi)041:138: shes rab rang bzhin yum mchog dang //
NK040(thi)041:139: gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang sems kyi //
NK040(thi)041:140: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho bdun gyi h'u /
NK040(thi)041:142: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni //
NK040(thi)041:143: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu la //
NK040(thi)041:144: bzung du med cing brjod du med //
NK040(thi)041:145: dngos po med pa'i chos nyid mchog /
NK040(thi)041:146: stong nyid snying rje chen po 'di //
NK040(thi)041:150: dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhi la //
NK040(thi)041:151: ri rab gling bzhi gling phran bcas //
NK040(thi)041:152: nyi ma zla ba gnyis kyi brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:153: 'khor lo nor bu btsun mo dang //
NK040(thi)041:154: blon po glang po rta mchog dang //
NK040(thi)041:155: dmag dpon la sogs rgyal srid bdun //
NK040(thi)041:156: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs //
NK040(thi)041:158: rgyal mtshan gdug dang bum pa dang //
NK040(thi)041:159: dung dang gser nya la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)041:160: bkra shis rtags brgyad thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)041:161: 'dod yon rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan //
NK040(thi)041:162: gser ri bdun dang rol mtsho bdun //
NK040(thi)041:163: a mo li ka'i rdo leb dang //
NK040(thi)041:164: ma rmos pa yi lo thog dang //
NK040(thi)041:165: dpag bsam shing dang tsan dan tshal //
NK040(thi)041:166: gur gum spang ri chen po dang //
NK040(thi)041:169: rin chen sna tshogs brgyan pa yi //
NK040(thi)041:171: bdag lus longs spyod bcas pa yi //
NK040(thi)041:173: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho bdun gyi h'u /
NK040(thi)041:175: thugs dam bskang ba'i dam rdzas ni //
NK040(thi)041:176: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul //
NK040(thi)041:177: sa dang bar snang gang ba yi //
NK040(thi)041:178: bskang rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
NK040(thi)041:179: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'khor 'bum tsho bdun gyi mkha'
NK040(thi)041:180: 'gro rnams kyi yang 'khor rnams kyi sha za rnams
NK040(thi)041:181: kyi dmen mo rnams kyi las mkhan rnams kyi thugs
NK040(thi)041:182: dam bskang // bran mo rnams kyi h'u /
NK040(thi)041:183: bdag ni rang rig blo dang ma ldan pas //
NK040(thi)041:184: bla ma rnams kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK040(thi)041:185: gnong shing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)041:186: yi dam lha yi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK040(thi)041:187: gnong shing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)041:188: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK040(thi)041:189: gnong shing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)041:190: chos skyong rnams kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK040(thi)041:191: gnong shing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)041:192: mthol lo bshags so bzod par gsol //
NK040(thi)041:193: bzod pa bzhes nas tshang par stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)041:194: ces mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i 'bum bskang chen po 'di
NK040(thi)041:195: kahthoga pa'i 'bangs kyi tha shal dpon pun+ye la k+shas
